lod.title: Distant Horizons mod
text.autoconfig.lod.title: Distant Horizons config
text.autoconfig.lod.option.client.graphi: What is the maximum detail fake chunks should be drawn at?
The mod's render distance, measured in chunks

This indicates how detailed fake chunks will represent overhangs, caves, floating islands, ect. 
Higher options will use more memory and increase GPU usage
This indicates how quickly fake chunks drop off in quality
This indicates the exponential base of the quadratic drop-off
At what distance should Fog be drawn on the fake chunks?

If true disable Minecraft's fog. 
May cause issues with other mods that edit fog. 
May cause errors with other fog editing mods

How should the LODs be drawn? 
NOTE: Currently only CUBIC is implemented!

If false fake chunks behind the player's camera aren't drawn, increasing performance. 
If true all LODs are drawn, even those behind the player's camera, decreasing performance
Disable quality falloff, all fake chunks will be drawn at the highest available detail level

How often should LODs be drawn on top of regular chunks? 
HALF and ALWAYS will prevent holes in the world, but may look odd for transparent blocks or in caves.
Will prevent some overdraw issues, but may cause nearby fake chunks to render incorrectly especially when in/near an ocean
text.autoconfig.lod.option.client.worldG: What is the priority of the chunks being generated around the player
How much of the generation should be used when generating fake chunks

Some features may not be thread safe. 
Could cause instability and crashes
What block to avoid when generating fake chunks
text.autoconfig.lod.option.client.advanc:
This is how many threads are used when generating LODs outside the normal render distance. 
If you experience stuttering when generating distant LODs, decrease this number. If you want to increase LOD generation speed, increase this number 
Can only be between 1 and your current number of threads

This is how many threads are used when building vertex buffers (The things sent to your GPU to draw the fake chunks) 
Can only be between 1 and your current number of threads
What method should be used to upload geometry to the GPU?

How long should we wait before uploading a buffer to the GPU? 
Helpful resource for frame times: https://fpstoms.com
If true, the mod is enabled and fake chunks will be drawn.
What type of debug mode do you want
Enable debug keybindings to change the Debug mode on the fly in game
